mapper.select: SELECT l.lecture_number, l.lecture_title, l.lecture_description, l.lecture_cost, l.subject_code, l.detail_subject_code, l.capacity, l.lecture_level_code, l.weekdays_code, l.time_code, l.lecture_start_date, l.lecture_end_date, l.instructor_number, i.name AS instructor_name, i.email AS instructor_email, i.address AS instructor_address, i.phone AS instructor_phone, i.final_education AS instructor_final_education FROM lecture l JOIN instructor i ON l.instructor_number = i.instructor_number
